headline: Women's History Month Spotlight: Marina Bay Sands' Penny Lo Outlines Her Career Journey and Key Learnings
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / April 4, 2025 /Las Vegas Sands During Women's History Month 2025, Sands is featuring women who help drive the company's success and exemplify its culture of advancement. Penny Lo joined Marina Bay Sands in 2010 ...
